languages.text: "О Великий, тебе это когда-нибудь надоест, законник? Стоп, не отвечай — вопрос был сугубо риторическим!"
"Oh, for the Exalted One's sake, will you ever get sick of edifying me, lawman? Wait, don't answer — that was a rhetorical question!"
languages.original_text: "О Великий, тебе это когда-нибудь надоест, законник? Стоп, не отвечай — вопрос был сугубо риторическим!"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, for the Exalted One's sake, will you ever get tired of edifying me, lawman? Wait, don't answer — that was a rhetorical question!"
"Oh, for the Exalted One's sake, will you ever get tired of edifying me, lawman? Wait, don't answer — that was a rhetorical question!"
"Oh, for the Exalted One's sake, will you ever get sick of edifying me, lawman? Wait, don't answer — that was a rhetorical question!"
"Oh, for the Exalted One's sake, will you ever get sick of edifying me, lawman? Wait, don't answer — that was a rhetorical question!"
"Oh, for the Exalted One's sake, will you ever get sick of edifying me, lawman? Wait, don't answer — that was a rhetorical question!"
"Oh, for the Exalted One's sake, will you ever get sick of edifying me, lawman? Wait, don't answer — that was a rhetorical question!"

languages.text: “啊，至高无上的神皇在上啊，你到底什么时候才能别再替我操心了，法务官？啊，等等，不要回答，这是个反问句！”
languages.original_text: "Oh, for the Exalted One's sake, will you ever get sick of edifying me, lawman? Wait, don't answer — that was a rhetorical question!"

traits.locale_text: “啊，至高无上的神皇在上啊，你到底什么时候才能别再替我操心了，法务官？啊，等等，不要回答，这是个反问句！”

languages.text: «Oh, por el amor del Exaltado, ¿no se cansa de sermonearme? No hace falta que conteste, ¡era una pregunta retórica!».
languages.original_text: "Oh, for the Exalted One's sake, will you ever get sick of edifying me, lawman? Wait, don't answer — that was a rhetorical question!"

traits.locale_text: «Oh, por el amor del Exaltado, ¿no se cansa de sermonearme? No hace falta que conteste, ¡era una pregunta retórica!».

languages.text: « Oh, par l'Exalté, vous pourriez arrêter d'essayer de me remettre dans le droit chemin, homme de loi ? Attendez, ne répondez pas, c'était une question purement rhétorique ! »
languages.original_text: "Oh, for the Exalted One's sake, will you ever get sick of edifying me, lawman? Wait, don't answer — that was a rhetorical question!"

traits.locale_text: « Oh, par l'Exalté, vous pourriez arrêter d'essayer de me remettre dans le droit chemin, homme de loi ? Attendez, ne répondez pas, c'était une question purement rhétorique ! »

languages.text: 「ああ、エグザルテッド・ワンのために、アンタはいつになったらアタシを教え諭すのに飽きるの？待って、答えなくていいわ。これは修辞的な質問だから！」
languages.original_text: "Oh, for the Exalted One's sake, will you ever get sick of edifying me, lawman? Wait, don't answer — that was a rhetorical question!"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、エグザルテッド・ワンのために、アンタはいつになったらアタシを教え諭すのに飽きるの？待って、答えなくていいわ。これは修辞的な質問だから！」

languages.text: "Görkemli aşkına... Bana ders vermekten hiç sıkılmayacak mısın kanuncu? Dur, cevap verme. Retorik bir soruydu bu!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, for the Exalted One's sake, will you ever get sick of edifying me, lawman? Wait, don't answer — that was a rhetorical question!"

traits.locale_text: "Ah, Görkemli aşkına, bana ders vermekten hiç sıkılmayacak mısın kanuncu? Dur, cevap verme, retorik bir soruydu!"

languages.text: "Oh, beim Erhabenen, werdet Ihr denn nie müde, mich zu erbauen, Gesetzeshüter? Wartet, spart Euch die Antwort – das war eine rhetorische Frage!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, for the Exalted One's sake, will you ever get sick of edifying me, lawman? Wait, don't answer — that was a rhetorical question!"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, beim Erhabenen, werdet Ihr denn nie müde, mich zu erbauen, Gesetzeshüter? Wartet, spart Euch die Antwort – das war eine rhetorische Frage!"
